snippet.title: Idle Champions of the Forgotten Realms Trailer
snippet.description:
Idle Champions of the Forgotten Realms is a licensed Dungeons & Dungeons strategy management video game uniting iconic characters from novels, campaigns, and popular shows into one epic adventure. 

Idle Champions of the Forgotten Realms is a strategy management game where players must assemble and organize a party of Champions to master the art of Formation Strategy. Players unlock new Champions, upgrade them with special abilities, and quest for epic weapons such as Drizzt Do'Urden's Icingdeath and Twinkle. The key to success is learning how to best combine each Champion's abilities to maximize their potential and defeat an onslaught of increasingly powerful monsters.

Key Features:

Unlock Renowned Champions: Collect renowned Champions from the world of Dungeons & Dragons, including fan-favorites from R.A. Salvatore’s best-selling novels, and Acquisitions Incorporated. Unlock additional Champions added to the game through campaign updates and limited-time events.

Formation Strategy: The key to completing each adventure is mastering Formation Strategy, knowing which Champions and synergies are needed to defeat the infinite waves of enemies.

Explore the Forgotten Realms: Take your Champions on a ‘grand tour’ of the Sword Coast, exploring familiar locations within the Forgotten Realms as they tackle each adventure. The game receives regular updates with content inspired by the official Dungeons & Dragons tabletop role-playing game adventures, including Waterdeep: Dragon Heist and Baldur's Gate: Descent into Avernus.

Regular Events: The game is updated regularly with limited-time events and additional campaign adventures. Completing events unlocks new Champions and gear to add to the player's collection.

Offline Progress: Your adventure continues even when you're not playing. Set-up your perfect formation and let your Champions battle monsters to earn gold until you switch on your Nintendo Switch again.

Time Gates: Choose to unlock the Champion you want if you missed their limited-time event.

Patron System: Revisit and replay your favourite adventures with new challenging restrictions for even greater rewards.
